attributes.action: Extend Help to Buy Scheme for 2nd time buyers build delays caused by Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: The Covid-19 Outbreak has caused lots of builds to fail the target deadline for completion, therefore will cause lots of failures to meet the deadline and therefore house purchases to collapse.
attributes.background: The scheme has a deadline of build completion for the 31st December

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331592
